messages.subject: quoting me and junk
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/13/2005 9:39:11 P.M. Mountain Standard Time, karri_a_lewis@yahoo.com writes: P.S.  Sandra-I hope you don t mind me quoting you in my
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/13/2005 9:39:11 P.M. Mountain Standard Time,
karri_a_lewis@... writes:

P.S. Sandra-I hope you don't mind me quoting you in my tagline. I just
found that what you said was so profound;-)


==============

I don't mind at all.
Cool!

-=- I really just don't like her to eat all of that junk that has all of
these unnatural things in them. -=-

Then don't buy it. Find candy without a lot of unnatural things.

Sandra



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
